category.name: Substance Compliance IMDS Integration
category.category_description: Teamcenter Preferences for Substance Compliance International Material Data System (IMDS) Integration

preference.name: IMDS_MDS_import_XSL_config_file
preference.preference_description: Specifies the path and name of the XSL configuration file to be used by the imds_download_process_files utility to import a material data sheet (MDS).
